messages.title: It's too close to call
messages.content: Your vote will make the difference.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The image suggests that the votes are close between the Tory, Lib Dem, and Labour parties, indicating a tactical situation where a small number of votes could swing the result.

images.caption: Graphical representation of a close race indicating that Lib Dem votes are crucial in a tightly contested race, alongside Tory and Labour votes.
